_a-0000ef39-a43c-8000-9ecf-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_QR_getClassificationModelVersion
_a-0000ef39-a43c-8000-9ecf-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!SHRD_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version,
  fields: {
    ri!fields
  },
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: ri!sort,
  identifier: ri!modelVersionId,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelVersionId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!modelVersionId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!modelId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.status,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!status
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.model.key,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!modelKey
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  }
)

_a-0000ec5c-9eda-8000-9bec-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Classification_GetLatestModelVersionIdByKey
_a-0000ec5c-9eda-8000-9bec-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
index(
  rule!AIA_QR_getClassificationModelVersion(
    returnType: "SINGLE_OBJECT",
    fields: {
      recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelVersionId
    },
    modelKey: ri!modelKey,
    modelId: ri!modelId,
    status: cons!AIA_MODEL_VERSION_STATUS_PUBLISHED,
    sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.versionId,
      ascending: false
    )
  ),
  recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelVersionId,
  tointeger(null)
)
